speech:
Here are some of the famous Myths behind Covid 19 pandemic:

1.Adding pepper to your soup or other meals *DOES NOT prevent* or cure COVID-19.

2.COVID-19 *IS NOT* transmitted through houseflies

3.Spraying and introducing bleach or another disinfectant into your body *WILL NOT* protect you against COVID-19 and can be dangerous.

4.Drinking methanol, ethanol or bleach *DOES NOT* prevent or cure COVID-19 and can be extremely dangerous.(Not kidding some have actually done it.)

5.You can recover from the coronavirus disease (COVID-19). Catching the new coronavirus *DOES NOT* mean you will have it for life.

6.COVID-19 virus *can be transmitted* in areas with hot and humid climates.

7.Cold weather and snow *CANNOT* kill the new coronavirus.

8.Taking a hot bath *does not prevent* the new coronavirus disease.





To go back to main menu reply with *menu*.

To stop the bot reply with *stop*.
